【Brushed Durable Aluminum Alloy Frame】Brushed Metal frame made of premium aluminum alloy, that's both sturdy and non-deforming, exuding elegance and sophistication.

【HD Explosion-proof Glass】The wall mirror is made of premium explosion-proof membrane glass so that it's safer for you and your family, which also features with HD image and undistorted reflection. Clear lines, simple modern design.

【Easy Install & Wide Application】: A ideal contemporary mirror for wall decor with brushed metal frame, very classic, perfectly goes with any decor, Installation accessories are included in the package. Only one hole needs to be punched in the wall for installation. An ideal addition to drawing people's eyes and getting more praise.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What if the mirror I received is broken? If you receive a broken mirror, we will send you a replacement mirror without you having to return the original product or pay an additional fee. How to install the mirror? We have detailed installation instructions in our package, just follow the steps. Will the mirror rust when installed in the bathroom? Metal mirror frames have a brushed finish. It will not rust or lose color when exposed to water. How should I do if the hardware missing? We will send you new hardware free of charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality and arrived in good condition
reviews.reviewText: The product is perfect to be used as a mirror over a bathroom vanity. Simple, but very nice quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality mirror, no warping on the reflection. Lightweight and the gold frame reflects a lot of light. The frame is not the best quality but the imperfections are minimal and not very noticeable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Liked It Enough I Bought Second
reviews.reviewText: I’m working on a bathroom painting and redecorating project and saw this mirror, so decided to give it a look. ;-) It turns out this mirror has good optical quality and the brushed finish on the frame goes well with other fixtures in the bathroom.Each mirror came with mounting screws that I used, and inserts that I don’t like, so I used my favorite fasteners which are the auger type. There’s also a full-size paper pattern inside the box that locates screw location and spacing for hanging the mirror. Careful layout of the pattern using painter’s tape can result in perfect centering, height, and plumb. Two cautions for layout using the pattern: I needed to compensate for the mirror holes being ⅛ “ closer together than in the pattern, so comparing the actual hole separation with the pattern may save a little grief. Second, there are X marks on the pattern for marking where the screws are to be placed and if you use these spots for locating screws, it will result in the mirror height being ½ “ lower than the pattern shows. This is due to the slot the mirror frame slides down to trap the screw heads.Mirror good, hardware and pattern second rate.Answering a question about whether the mirror corners are round or square: if your mirror corners are not like in this picture, you have the wrong mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect, exactly as described. Easy install and Reasonably priced!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size: 30x40IN | Color: Black
reviews.reviewText: My 43-year-old sheet mirror in my master bath has seen better days. I was certain I would replace the bathroom mirror with another sheet mirror until I happened to see this mirror. It is sturdy, I like the heavy-duty black frame that the mirror is set into. The mirror glass is of good quality as there are no distortions. I used a glass cleaner to clean it and it left the mirror reflecting nicely with no streaks. I decided to have the bathroom remodeled to match the black frame of the mirror. My contractor has not yet installed the mirror but was not impressed with the screws provided in the package for hanging, he will be using what he uses to hang bathroom mirrors. I will update my review once the mirror is installed and in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous and big
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect!! Even being delivered on a snowy day, it came in perfect condition!! No water or anything to ruin it.
